To these <S%G3739><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> showed <S%G3936><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> he <S%G846><s%> suffered, <S%G3958><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> proofs, <S%G5039><s%> appearing <S%G3700><s%> to <S%G1223><s%> them <S%G846><s%> over a period of forty <S%G5062><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> speaking <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s Kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

Being <S%G2532><s%> assembled together <S%G4871><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> he commanded <S%G3853><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5563><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> depart <S%G5563><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> but <S%G235><s%> wait for <S%G4037><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you heard <S%G191><s%> from me. <S%G3450><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> in water, <S%G5204><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> will be baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> from now. <S%G3778><s%>"

When <S%G2532><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> as they were looking, <S%G991><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was taken up, <S%G1869><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> received <S%G5274><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sight. <S%G3788><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "You <S%G2476><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1057><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2476><s%> stand looking <S%G1689><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sky? <S%G3772><s%> This Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who was received up <S%G353><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> will <S%G2064><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> back in the same <S%G3779><s%> way <S%G5158><s%> as <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G2300><s%> him <S%G846><s%> going <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sky. <S%G3772><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> they <S%G5290><s%> returned to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Olivet, <S%G1638><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> near Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> a <S%G2192><s%> Sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>'s journey <S%G3598><s%> away. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> they had <S%G2258><s%> come in, <S%G1525><s%> they went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the upper room, <S%G5253><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> they <S%G5037><s%> were staying; <S%G2650><s%> that is Peter, <S%G4074><s%> <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> <S%G2532><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Matthew, <S%G3156><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Zealot, <S%G2207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> the son of James. <S%G2385><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2258><s%> with one accord <S%G3661><s%> continued <S%G4342><s%> steadfastly in prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication, <S%G1162><s%> along with <S%G4862><s%> the women, <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood up <S%G450><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> (and the number <S%G3793><s%> of names <S%G3686><s%> <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> one hundred <S%G1540><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%>), and <S%G5037><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G2674><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> numbered <S%G2674><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2975><s%> his portion <S%G2819><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> ministry. <S%G1248><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> obtained <S%G2932><s%> a field <S%G5564><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the reward <S%G3408><s%> for his wickedness, <S%G93><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> falling <S%G1096><s%> headlong, <S%G4248><s%> his body burst open, <S%G2997><s%> <S%G3319><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> intestines <S%G4698><s%> gushed out. <S%G1632><s%>

It <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G1565><s%> lived <S%G2730><s%> in Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> that <S%G5620><s%> in their <S%G846><s%> <S%G2398><s%> language <S%G1258><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> field <S%G5564><s%> was called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G184><s%> 'Akeldama,' that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G5564><s%> 'The field of blood. <S%G129><s%>'

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G1125><s%> 'Let is another written take in <S%G1722><s%> his the office. <S%G976><s%>' book of Psalms, <S%G5568><s%> <S%G1096><s%> 'Let his <S%G846><s%> habitation <S%G1886><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> made desolate. <S%G2048><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Let <S%G2077><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> one dwell <S%G2730><s%> therein; <S%G846><s%>'

"Of the men <S%G435><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> have accompanied <S%G4905><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went in <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> among <S%G1909><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%>

beginning <S%G756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he was received up <S%G353><s%> from <S%G575><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> must <S%G1096><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> resurrection. <S%G386><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> put forward <S%G2476><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Barsabbas, <S%G923><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Justus, <S%G2459><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Matthias. <S%G3159><s%>

to take <S%G2983><s%> part <S%G2819><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> apostleship <S%G651><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> fell <S%G3845><s%> away, <S%G4198><s%> that he might go to <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> drew <S%G1325><s%> <S%G846><s%> lots <S%G2819><s%> for them, <S%G2532><s%> and the lot <S%G2819><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> Matthias, <S%G3159><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he was numbered <S%G4785><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%> apostles. <S%G652><s%>
